entry.title: Friday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Snow mixed with ice pellets early this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023
